document.full_text: ministers from the nato-backed coalition against libyan leader muammar gaddafi meet in rome on thursday seeking ways to get money to rebels who are desperate to buy food and medicine and shore up their administration.
document.title: libya coalition tries to help rebels raise funds
lines_and_colors: ministers from the nato-backed coalition against libyan leader muammar gaddafi meet in rome on thursday seeking ways to get money to rebels who are desperate to buy food and medicine and shore up their administration.
